STRING_AT_LEAST: This field must be at least {{min}} characters
STRING_AT_MUST: This cannot be more than {{max}} characters
EMAIL_IS_NOT_UNIQUE: There is an account already using this email
PHONE_IS_NOT_UNIQUE: There is an account already using this phone number
FORM_PASSWORD_IS_WEAK: It must have at least: 8 characters, one uppercase character, one symbol and one number.
INVALID_INVITATION_CODE: The invitation code is not valid
USER_IS_NOT_UNIQUE: A user is already registered with that phone number and/or email
INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS_IN_DEBITED_WALLET: Insufficient funds in the debited wallet
